scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:bench
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:root:vite" "npm run dev:root:webpack" "npm run dev:root:rspack" "npm run dev:mfe:vite" "npm run dev:mfe:webpack"
scripts.prod:all: concurrently "npm run prod:root:vite" "npm run prod:root:webpack" "npm run prod:root:rspack" "npm run prod:mfe:vite" "npm run prod:mfe:webpack"
scripts.prod:root:vite: cd esm-roots/vite && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.prod:root:webpack: cd esm-roots/webpack && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.prod:root:rspack: cd esm-roots/rspack && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.prod:mfe:vite: cd mfes/vite && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.prod:mfe:webpack: cd mfes/webpack && npm run build && npm run preview
